nodes.text: Trigalis was an astronomical object located in the regions known as the Outer Rim Territories and the Trailing Sectors. It was also situated in the grid square P-17 of the Standard Galactic Grid. A hyperspace route connected Trigalis to the asteroid Vergesso as well as Farstine in the Mid Rim.

Trigalis was first depicted in the new Star Wars canon on a galactic map in the 2016 StarWars.com article "Where in the Galaxy Are the Worlds of Star Wars: The Force Awakens?" The planet Trigalis was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it first appeared in the first issue of the Star Wars: Obsession comic series. The comic was published on November 24, 2004 and was written by Haden Blackman and penciled by Brian Ching.
